text: Chandia is a town and a nagar panchayat in Umaria district in the state of Madhya Pradesh, India. ==Geography== Chandia is located at .Falling Rain Genomics, Inc - Chandia It has an average elevation of 398 metres (1,305 feet). ==Demographics== India census, Chandia had a population of 12,806. Males constitute 51% of the population and females 49%. Chandia has an average literacy rate of 53%, lower than the national average of 59.5%; with male literacy of 65% and female literacy of 40%. 17% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Umaria district
title: Chandia, Madhya Pradesh
